Sentencas: A direct flame fuel cell setup is designed and built based on a multi-element diffusion flame burner (MEDB).
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: Flame temperature measurements are made using a fine-wire S-type thermocouple to characterize the flat flame burner performance.
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: The MEDB is proven to provide uniform, similar to 1D conditions above the surface of the burner, with temperature variations of less than +/- 2% in the transverse direction (parallel to the burner surface).
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: The temperature distribution in flame height direction is also approximately uniform within the length of 45 mm.
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: Direct flame fuel cell experiments were performed using an anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based on button cell geometry.
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: The cell power density can reach up to 400 W/m(2) with fuel equivalent ratio at phi = 1.2 and flame temperature at 1085 K, which is around 1/3 of the original performance of the SOFC fueled with 97% hydrogen at 1073 K.
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners

Sentencas: Finally, a novel DFFC configuration is proposed to take advantage the flame uniformity in both the vertical and horizontal directions.
Titulo: Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners
Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners
Integration of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Multi-Element Diffusion Flame Burners
